New Records: Anrich Nortje claimed a four-fer, taking four wickets for South Africa
Key Match Events: Klaasen smashes Hasaranga for a maximum and a four to make it easy for the Proteas
Hasaranga strikes again to dismiss Tristan Stubbs
Matheesha Pathirana delivers a toe-crushing yorker to Heinrich Klaasen
Wanindu Hasaranga removes Quinton de Kock
Dasun Shanaka maintains pressure with a tidy over
Post-Match Reflections: Anrich Nortje discussed the pitch conditions and his performance post-match
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa (80/4) beat Sri Lanka (77 all out) by 6 wickets
Proteas start favourites with a strong bowling lineup
